title: Psychiatrische Therapie-Forschung: Ethische und Juristische Probleme (Therapeutic Research in Psychiatry: Ethical and Legal Problems). Edited by H. Helmchen and B. Müller-Oerlinghausen. (Pp. 179; $24.00.) Springer-Verlag: Berlin, 1978.
